Soy un contrato inteligente BEP20 en la: I am a BEP20 smart contract on the SmartChain blockchain, with these details:
Soy la primera versión del proyecto FIRU: I am the first version of the FIRULAIX project, with the aim of generating a capitalization to be able to identify all my canine and feline friends who have a home or are on the streets. When my friends are identified, I will be able to share my virtual wallets with all of them so that they can have their own funds, managed by their owners and thus they can be treated in all clinical establishments, stores and airports. With this generate a trade dedicated to the animals.
¿Cómo lograré mis objetivos?: How will I achieve my goals?
Con el capital recaudado crearemos nuest: With the capital raised we will create our own blockchain to register the codes of the chips that we will implant to all our friends, together with the ERC721 smart contracts we will achieve a unique registry. This first stage will be the beginning of the identification and traceability of other animals such as cattle, fish, farm birds, zoo animals, etc ... The approach we have is the authentication of my canine friends from birth, making them a traceability of generation after generation, ensuring their pedigree breed in a safe and efficient manner.
La blockchain es una red super segura qu: The blockchain is a super secure network that will help us link the chip code to the main registry in the blockchain and at the same time provide each animal user with an address that they can use to save my FIRU's tokens. The chips that we are going to implant are the size of a grain of rice and can hold valuable data for identification, location and verification to whom it belongs, imagine if we keep that safely on my own network in BLOKCHAIN ​​and additional To all this, I will have my own cryptocurrency so that all veterinarians, clinics and pet stores can receive them, we will achieve this thanks to our partners who are very important to us and are part of an association where there are more than 200 establishments, together with district municipalities, animal care centers, animal friends and others ...

Si aún no ha conectado su billetera a Ap: If you have not yet connected your wallet to Apeswap, you can do so with the connect button on the top right of the platform. you can see the guide
Elija el token con el que desea operar e: Choose the token you want to trade with from the drop-down menu in the 'Front' section. The default setting is BUSD. Whichever token you choose, you will need to make sure you have a few to trade with. Your balance is displayed above the token drop-down menu.
Elija el token con el que desea comercia: Choose the token you want to trade in the 'To' section as stated above. Next, enter an amount for your 'To' currency by clicking inside the input box. The 'From' coin amount will be calculated automatically. You can also type in the 'From' quantity and have the 'To' quantity estimate automatically if you wish.
Verifique los detalles y haga clic en el: Check the details and click the 'Change' button.
A window with more details will appear. Check that the details are correct. When you're ready, click the Confirm Trade button. Your wallet will ask you to confirm the action.
¡Listo! Puede hacer clic en Ver en BscSc: Ready! You can click View in BscScan to view the details of your transaction in the browser.
Para proporcionar liquidez, deberá compr: To provide liquidity, you will need to commit an amount of any pair of tokens you want. Your lower value (in USD) of the two tokens will be the limit to the liquidity you can provide.
Seleccione la token que agregará liquide: Select the token that will add liquidity in this example we use BUSD and FIRU, enter an amount in one of the tokens in 'Entry'. The other will calculate it automatically.
Haga clic en el botón Aprobar FIRU. Su b: Click the Approve FIRU button. Your wallet will ask you to confirm the action.
El botón de suministro se iluminará. Pin: The supply button will illuminate. Click it.
Aparecerá una ventana que indica cuánto: A window will appear indicating how much effect. Click the Confirm Supply button. Your wallet will ask you to confirm the action.
Después de una breve espera, verá el sal: After a short wait, you will see your LP Token balance at the bottom of the page and you can repeat the steps above to add more liquidity at any time.
